sourcesContent:
import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import '../../styles/style.css'; import apiCall from '../../util/apiCall'; export default class Statistic extends Component { state = { tickerToLook: null, stockStats: {}, stockEPS: {} } getStats (symbol) { if(symbol) { const endpoint = `/api/stock/${symbol}/stats` const promise = apiCall(endpoint,'get') promise.then(blob => blob.json()).then (json=> { console.log("STATS", json) this.setState({ stockStats: json.stats, stockEPS: json.eps }) }) }} componentDidUpdate(prevProps) { if(this.props.match.params.symbol && this.props.match.params.symbol !== this.state.tickerToLook) { this.setState({tickerToLook: this.props.match.params.symbol}) this.getStats(this.props.match.params.symbol) } } render() { roundTo = require('round-to') const { companyName,marketcap,peRatio,dividendYield,employees,beta,avg30Volume,day30ChangePercent, ttmEPS,ttmDividendRate,week52change,year1ChangePercent,week52low,week52high } = this.state.stockStats const { EPSReportDate,actualEPS,consensusEPS,fiscalPeriod,yearAgo,yearAgoChangePercent } = this.state.stockEPS return (
Company name
{companyName}
Employees
{employees}
MarketCap
{marketcap?
{roundTo(marketcap/1e9,4)}
B
:"-"}
PeRatio
{peRatio}
Average Volume (30days)
{avg30Volume}
Change Percent (30 days)
{day30ChangePercent}
52 weeks change
{week52change}
52 weeks low
{week52low}
52 weeks high
{week52high}
Year Change Percent
{year1ChangePercent}
ttmDividendRate
{ttmDividendRate}
Beta
{beta}
Dividend Yield
{dividendYield}
ttmEPS
{ttmEPS}
ttmDividendRate
{ttmDividendRate}
Actual EPS
{actualEPS}
consensus EPS
{consensusEPS}
Fiscal Period
{fiscalPeriod}
Year Ago
{yearAgo}
Year Ago Change Percent
{yearAgoChangePercent}
) } }
